text: kya ye log (tumhaaree nisbat kahate hain ki is (rasool) ne khuda par jhootha bohataan baandha hai to agar (aisa) hota to) khuda chaahata to tumhaare dil par mohar laga deta (ki tum baat hee na kar sakate) aur khuda to jhooth ko nestanaabood aur apanee baaton se haq ko saabit karata hai vah yaqeenee dilon ke raaz se khoob vaaqiph hai
